name: Kabocha No Nimono (Squash Simmered in Sake-Soy Sauce)
description: Kabocha, also known as Japanese Pumpkin, is simmered until tender in a sweet-salty broth.
recipeIngredient: 1 kabocha squash, peeled, seeded, and cut into roughly 2 inch pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Place squash in a large saucepan. Cover with dashi broth and bring to a boil.
Add soy sauce, vinegar, mirin, and sake. Continue to boil until squash is tender and sauce has reduced, 6-8 minutes.
Place squash in bowls. Top with extra broth.
